text:
Antonio Tajani (born 4 August 1953) is an Italian politician. He served as President of the European Parliament from January 2017 to July 2019. He served as European Commissioner for Industry and Entrepreneurship between 2010 and 2014. Tajani was also European Commissioner for Transport (2008–2010). He is a member of Forza Italia party.
Tajani studied law at the Sapienza University of Rome. He was first elected to the European Parliament in 1994.

annotations.surface_form: European Commissioner for Industry and Entrepreneurship
